entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
